name: Squirrel Lab
description:
It slowly builds to a pretty challenging puzzle game, you have been warned
Sorry for the movement "snapping" it is for lining up to grid spaces, it is really annoying sorry :/
Features multiple players, transformations, puzzles!

Controls: movement-(wasd or arrow keys)
toggle active-(123, or click) note-goo squirrel cannot toggle off
interact-(space,e,or 0)
